keyMoments.title: Smoker vs Vergo Battle Begins
keyMoments.description: Smoker engages in intense combat with Vergo in the SAD Room, fighting against the traitor Marine Vice Admiral.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's commitment to justice even when facing a fellow Vice Admiral who has betrayed the Marines.

keyMoments.title: Vergo Battles Smoker in SAD Room
keyMoments.description: Vergo fights Smoker with deadly intent, revealing himself as a Donquixote Pirates operative protecting Caesar's operations.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms Vergo's complete betrayal of the Marines and his allegiance to the Donquixote Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Full-Body Armament Haki Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Vergo demonstrates his mastery of Armament Haki by coating his entire body and weapon in black hardening.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Vergo as one of the most skilled Haki users shown in the series to this point, demonstrating advanced combat capabilities.

abilities.description: Vergo can coat his entire body in Armament Haki, creating a complete hardened armor that enhances both offense and defense.
Advanced mastery of Busoshoku Haki allowing hardening of body and weapons.

reveals.information: Capable of full-body Armament Haki hardening

keyMoments.title: Caesar Closes Gates to Trap Everyone
keyMoments.description: Caesar remotely closes the gates to C and D blocks, trapping all intruders and forcing them toward section R where poisonous gas awaits.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Caesar's ruthless plan to eliminate all witnesses to his crimes, willing to kill Marines, pirates, and his own subordinates.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Deliberately Caused Punk Hazard Catastrophe
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals that Caesar intentionally triggered the poison gas explosion four years ago, murdering and maiming hundreds of people for his weapons research.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes Caesar as a genocidal mass murderer who deliberately caused the catastrophe he claimed was an accident, establishing him as one of the most evil villains in the series.

reveals.information: Deliberately caused the Punk Hazard catastrophe four years ago, intentionally killing hundreds of people

keyMoments.title: Navigating Battle-Damaged B-Block
keyMoments.description: Sanji, along with Tashigi and G-5 Marines, navigates through the heavily damaged B-block section of the research facility.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates continued cooperation between Straw Hats and Marines against their common enemy, Caesar Clown.

keyMoments.title: Navigating B-Block with Sanji
keyMoments.description: Tashigi leads G-5 Marines through the damaged B-block alongside Sanji, working together despite their opposing affiliations.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Tashigi's pragmatic leadership and her willingness to cooperate with pirates when facing a greater threat.

keyMoments.title: Discovers the Talking Dragon
keyMoments.description: Luffy discovers a small, speaking dragon in the basement of the research facility. The dragon appears frightened and distressed.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery leads to the revelation of Momonosuke's identity and the existence of artificial Devil Fruits, a major plot element.

keyMoments.title: Discovered as the Talking Dragon
keyMoments.description: Momonosuke is discovered by Luffy in his dragon form, unable to transform back to human form. He appears as a small pink dragon that can speak.
keyMoments.significance: This moment sets up the revelation of his identity and the artificial Devil Fruit he consumed, introducing a major plot element to the series.
